import React, { useState } from 'react' const UpdateForm = ({issue, toggleEditMode}) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: issue.title, body: issue.body, priority: issue.priority, status: issue.status }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); toggleEditMode(); console.log(formData) } return (
{/* Slect box for status */}
{/* Slect box for status */}
{/* Title */}
handleSubmit(e)} type="submit" className="btn btn-success" value="Save" />

) } export default UpdateForm
